title: Cat's Night Out
description: Catherine Moore, Cat to her friends, trained with her friend Agatha Blackmore to be the best FBI Agents to ever graduate from the Academy. When Agatha left for her Probi assignment Cat had one of her own. A serial killer stalked the South. Sometimes it takes a Monster to catch a Monster.  Read this and other Tales from the Federal Witch Universe today!
author: T.S. Paul
